siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Jon and Mrs. Kohlmeier are headed to visit LemonLand this week, tune in for more on those adventures. Most of this episode is spent sharing our listeners ranking of Fast Food (apparently our lists caused some disagreement.) Listen in, enjoy, and share with a friend…

frontmatter.title: Listeners Speak Out: Fast Food Edition

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, We check in on how Stan’s RV trip went as his first post-pandemic vacation. Sounds like it went well for the most part. Finally we kick off the discussion on our top Fast Food joints. Danchez submitted his top 5. Stan and Jon both go through their top 10. We’ll be…
